body_html: I do think inputs should make a copy. It is very easy to use it in a loop thinking you have a reference to the inputs, and It is surprising behavior. Apparently we need to do this for outputs, which I also think is surprising behavior, but I'd rather fix outputs rather than regress inputs.

Apparently we need to do this for outputs, which I also think is surprising behavior, but I'd rather fix outputs rather than regress inputs.
body: I do think inputs should make a copy. It is very easy to use it in a loop thinking you have a reference to the inputs, and It is surprising behavior. Apparently we need to do this for outputs, which I also think is surprising behavior, but I'd rather fix outputs rather than regress inputs.
